description: To replace blinds and shades in buildings at CFB Esquimalt
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

* **Tender Reference:** W0103-239335
* **Title (English):** Window Coverings
* **Title (French):** Des couvre-fenêtres
* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-22
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-24T14:00:00
* **Unspsc Code:** *52131600
* **Unspsc Description (English):** *Blinds and Shades
* **Unspsc Description (French):** *Stores et volets

**Background**
------------

The Naval Fleet School Pacific, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is soliciting bids to replace blinds and old roller shades in several buildings located at Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, Naden, and Work Point.

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** *British Columbia

**Requirements**
--------------

The successful bidder will be required to provide all necessary materials, labor, and equipment to replace the blinds and old roller shades. The installation must meet the relevant code and regulatory requirements.

**Specifications**
----------------

* The successful bidder must provide a price breakdown for all materials, labor, and equipment.
* The installation must meet the relevant building codes and regulatory requirements.
* The bidder must provide a warranty for the installation.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Contracting Agency:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Bill Reusch
* **Contact Email:** bill.reusch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
--------------

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15779185?extsite=MTU3NzkxODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: No attachments are included with this notice. Bidders must register and submit their proposal electronically through the provided link.
